author: Shalyn O'Malley
text: 'We were here for a 30th birthday party in the back bar. They were so amazing - we had the best time. Would HIGHLY recommend. Our bartender Alex was the best.'

author: Ringoue Kumar
text: "I ordered the crooked knife
column5: but didn't like it. Got to throw up."

author: Hannah Khattab
text: 'Came here last week for a friends birthday and the food was great as well as the service. Our waiter
column5: Leni
column6: made sure everything was perfect and was super attentive. My friends and I have been here a couple times before but Leni made our experience at the Ainsworth the best one yet. Thanks again.'

author: Nivedita J
text: 'Never take your kids here...they will get ptsd with loud noise\nI read your response below - No thank you. I am never coming back again. You straight away declined our request to reduce the loud music (A BIT!) It was honestly deaf-ning. Never coming back again.'

author: Ali A
text: 'Excellent location vibe and food- definitely the Saturday night party spot!'

author: Ash GR
text: 'The location is really good with view. I had the grilled salmon with veggies
column5: and cauliflower appetizer. The cauliflower dish was not that great
column6: the staff can certainly work on improving their service. I ordered for hot water and got iced water
column7: they also confused with my entree order!!'

author: Philip Mierswa
text: 'The burger was very good
column5: the burger assembly was amateur at best
column6: resulting in a mess of toppings on my plate despite my best efforts to keep it together.'

author: Tommy DeSimone
text: 'The Short Rib Grilled Cheese is a must.'

author: John Welson
text: "Very small portion of food ! very expensive ! cheeseburger was hard like a rock  ! expect to pay a minimum $100 for 2  !!!  don't go there
column5: Greedy owners. They think they are in New York ?\nhello !!  this is New Jersey  NOT NYC ! Lot of fake reviews !!👹"

author: J Spiegel
text: 'I never post reviews but I had to post this one because it was such a great experience.\nHad my daughters 16th birthday dinner for 12 kids and it was so easy to plan
column5: so easy once we arrived and they all loved their meals. The staff there was attentive
column6: friendly and didn’t miss anything. We had another table just for 4 adults separate from the kids beautiful set up in another space
column7: and I didn’t once worry. I plan events for business and I have to say Haylee and staff confidentially pull your event together so you don’t have to worry at all! Super reasonable pricing for a party
column9: made me look like a really smart MOM! Thank you Ainsworth!!!'

author: Gilbert Tapia
text: 'Daniela was our waitress. She was the best! Super helpful!'

author: Krystian Quintana
text: 'I am a hospitality consultant and I must say that your service and quality of food and drinks were phenomenal! I believe his name was Galo
column5: he’s a bartender
column6: he was exceptional! One of the best old fashioned I’ve had in awhile. Great bar service and the food was fantastic as well! I will definitely be back!'

author: Taylor Burgio
text: 'Great service! Noel was our waiter. Food was delicious'

author: Denise Gray
text: 'The gold wings are indeed legendary. The energy is fun and up; just what we need now. Daniella
column5: our server was great!'

author: Javari Burrell
text: 'Food was to die for but our waiter Daniella made our experience 1000 times better!!! Thank you for 24k service and wings!'

author: Jenise Bishop
text: 'Food was great and Daniella was an amazing waitress. The Mac and cheese burger is a must!! Drinks A+++'

author: Kamryn Montalvo
text: 'Food was delicious. Noel was our waiter and he was super amazing!'

author: Tania Rivas
text: 'The view is incredible in this place
column5: the atmosphere during brunch is the best
column6: the food was quite good and our waitress Daniela was always very attentive to us.  we will come back!!'

author: Alina C
text: 'Excellent food
column5: the Ribeye steak was very delicious. Nicole was our server and gave us the best attention !!'

author: Adriana S
text: 'Service is always great
column5: Nicole was a very attentive and kind server. And food was delicious
column6: I will be back soon !!'

author: Rakhil Soman
text: 'Had a wonderful time with friends. Godd and prompt service by Eleni. The Mac and cheese burger was awesome.'

author: Karthik Raveendran
text: 'Really good view of the New York skyline. Great food
column5: awesome portions. The service was exceptional with a smile by Eleni'

author: daniel vergara
text: 'Nice place
column5: view  and good service. I went today for brunch
column6: definitely try Macburger is delicious and thanks daniela for hospitality.'

author: K. McDonald
text: 'Really great brunch! Just leaving now
column5: second time here this month! Bottomless brunch is great! Service staff is really great
column6: Elleni took care of us. Handled the entire outside section and we never went without her attention! Would definitely recommend'

author: Chelsea Vena
text: 'Noel was a great waiter! He checked on our table often and kept the drinks coming! Would highly recommend this restaurant and of course
column5: Noel!! He was the best.'

author: Caroline Valenzano
text: 'Great brunch! Love the bottomless special. We had a server named Noel who was the absolute BEST! Would definitely come back!'

author: Kelly Schulhafer
text: 'I had a Great experience at the Ainsworth. Our waiter was Noel and he made everything that much better! Awesome waiter! Would definitely recommend!'

author: Jordan Doherty
text: 'Noel was an awesome waiter!  Very attentive and kind. He made the experience even better. The food was awesome and the drinks were great!'

author: Emily Cummings
text: "Sat here on a Saturday night
column5: waited 10 mins and  said something to the bartender who told me he couldn’t serve me and he’d send someone. Waited another 10 mins said something to another person who said someone would be right w me. 5 mins later I left. What a terrible place
column6: who makes you wait 25 minutes for service
column7:
with EMPTY tables and slow crowd. Wild.

***Wanted to update my review***

Came here 2 Sundays ago to give them a second shot
column8: the waitress butched our order and the salad gave me food poisoning. Was sick for 2 days. I know it was the salad because after a few bites it tasted off to me so i stopped eating it. We had our son with us and asked for water for him and she gave me a glass cup for him... not so safe for a 1 year old kid
column9: but maybe they don't have child friendly options since there is no kid friendly food options either. Extremely over priced for the food / service you receive. Save yourself the time and money and try out one of the other restaurants next door- they are all far superior to this dump."

author: Mike Schwartz
text: 'Great food
column5: killer drinks. Try the brunch menu. Eleni was our waitress and she was absolutely lovely. Highly recommend.'

author: Dominique Brancato
text: 'ASK FOR LENI!!!! I was in a group of like 20 people and we had Leni as our server and she was absolutely wonderful. The food was delicious
column5: the music was good
column6: and Leni was AMAZING! 15/10 would recommend'

author: Courtney Marie
text: 'Had Leni as our server and she was AMAZING!!! Went above and beyond for our group of 12+. We’ll definitely be back because of her service!!!!'

author: Jacqueline Browne
text: 'I had a private event at the Ainsworth last weekend for my birthday and it went amazingly! The event planner I emailed back and forth with was very responsive and flexible with all of my questions. The event itself was so much fun. The back part of the restaurant was secured off for the event with 2 private bar tenders - Alex and Shanelly. They were very attentive to all of guests and very nice. They helped set up the cake and cannolis I had brought and displayed it out for the guests. Even when I first walked in the hostess was very friendly and helpful. Wonderful event! If you need a place to have your event
column5: the Ainsworth will for sure do a beautiful job.'

author: Mackenzie W
text: 'My friends and I went for an after happy hour dinner and it was great! The food was delicious
column5: the service was wonderful. Our server Miguel was very on top of it and the manager Corbin even came over to check on our table. My friend ordered the 24K wings and they even came with a sparkler! So fun!'

author: Megan Nichol
text: 'Had the best chicken pesto sandwich here!!! Would highly recommend ordering! Our server Andre and the manager Corbin were both very friendly and made our table feel welcome and cared for!'

author: Colleen Hannon
text: 'Staff was so nice and attentive . Food was incredible.great place !!'

author: Philip Leotardo
text: 'After doing 20 years in the can
column5: me and my kid brother Billy needed to grab a bite after doing a pick up from the Esplanade in Newark. Ho’ lemme tell ya
column6: the way they run things here
column7: it’s all sorts of messed up and they have no respect for our thing. I knew something was wrong the second I took my seat
column8: I didn’t feel like I was sitting at 12 o’clock. I could have sat in there until freakin San Gennaro
column9: I would not have been sitting at 12 o’clock. They tried to tell me it seemed ok to them
column10: how could it be ok if it’s askew? We had no idea who our server was the entire time
column11: nobody checking up on us. Had to grab the attention of anybody that walked by for anything we needed. Drinks
column15: etc. just flat out bad service. A lot of compromises had to be made. I wanted Fried Calamari. I compromised. I was given low quality frozen Shoprite tier Onion Rings instead. I wanted the Grilled Chicken Pesto Sandwich. I compromised. I was given a bread sandwich instead (see photo). 5 freaking locations in New York and they got this other pygmy thing over in Jersey. Don’t waste your time or money here.'

author: Jasmine Ace
text: 'This place & the ambient is perfect. Music is great food is definitely a plus & the drinks are amazing. Service was awesome. Outside seating available with a view to die for.'

author: vrinda chopra
text: 'It is good. Not over the top'

author: Maureen Langan
text: "Had a dinner for 16 off the main dining room/bar.  Was great! Service wonderful
column5: food outstanding
column6: nice prices and super friendly staff.  The event coordinator Haylee was a dream to work with!  One thing to bear in  mind is that the room is off the bar and it's loud with music and TV-fun environment but maybe not for a more quiet event. Overall great experience!"

author: Magdalena Olech
text: 'Atmosphere
column5: food
column6: and drinks were great. Alex
column7: the bartender was awesome! Very personable
column9: and attentive. Definitely would be going back.'

author: Ileana Driggs
text: "Came here with friends on a Saturday night. Alex took care of us and he was great! Drinks and food were so good! Can't wait to come back!"

author: Nicole Cavaliere
text: 'I came here last night with a groups of friend for my friends birthday. We came in around 9 and sat right by the door. Alex was helping us for the night and everything was great! The food was delicious and the drinks were on point! Will definitely be coming back!!'

author: Tae Kim
text: 'Just the kind of food you can eat anywhere'

author: Jessi Luna
text: 'Everything about this place is nice. Dinner was yummm sauce! Oh also had white and red wine (came with significant other) awesome yummm sauceeee!'

author: Christopher Huber
text: "It's overpriced for food that would be good. This food wasn't even good. The buffalo cauliflower was sitting in water on the plate. The service was a pretty slow."

author: Lori Chilenski
text: 'The absolute worst experience and a complete ripoff!  I would give zero stars if I could.'

author: Morgan Laidlow
text: 'I celebrated my birthday here and all the staff was super accommodating. I had a brunch party of about 15 and we had the back room to ourselves. Very clean and beautifully set up.'

author: Demetrius Terry
text: 'My waiter Laura was amazing and I will definitely be coming back . Great experience'

author: Michael Desousa
text: 'I really enjoy coming here and sitting at the bar
column5: I always make sure I get the chicken pesto sandwich
column6: it comes highly recommended and is always very satisfying. The bar service is always attentive and on point. Great spot for food or even a sporting event. Def check it out'

author: Wesley Barranco
text: 'Dope experience! DJ Mike was great!!'

author: Resham Kadam
text: 'The waitress handed me the check when we were not even finished!!\nMy friend and I went here to get a couple of cocktails. The drinks were great but the waitress kept eyeing our drinks and lingering around every 30 seconds. She made it so obvious that she was waiting on us finishing up! We were only there for 15-20 mins maximum and ordered 2 rounds. She straight up handed us the check when we were not done and we were not even planning on being done! They just lost business. Very unprofessional.\nThere were other couples there who were only drinking and they didn’t bother them!? Why the bad treatment selectively?'

author: Natalia Arbeláez
text: 'Amazing experience with delicious food and environment 😊...'

author: Lorraine Ramadan
text: 'Service was terrible.  We waited hours for our food.\nSimple burgers and the place was not crowded.  Don’t understand it. Thanks'

author: PARNEET KAUR
text: 'DJ MIKE WAS AWESOME!!! EVEN BOUGHT A SONG FOR ME TO PLAY PUNJABI STYLE!!'

author: Caroline McKew
text: 'Loved it great good'

author: Kiley Mc Artney
text: 'The food and cocktails are good!'

author: Lucy García
text: 'Pricey food
column5: excellent service
column6: generous portions
column7: expensive cocktails and a pleasant atmosphere. The vegetarian pizza and the arugula salad were delicious. I highly recommend it if your wallet can afford it.'

author: liz gosselin
text: 'We went on a 90 degree
column5: Saturday afternoon. While the food was good
column6: the music was so loud we had to repeat/yell our order several times and the waiter forgot our app.  We were sweating as we were eating because the air conditioning was broken. On such a hot day
column7: the costumer should have been told about the air conditioning before being seated.'

author: Shakirah Chambers
text: 'Brunch was great
column5: Laura was our server and she was awesome! We didn’t feel like going into the city so this was the perfect happy medium. We got city vibes right here in NJ. We’ll definitely be going back soon!'

author: Mollie Crom
text: "This place was truly terrible. My party had a reservation for brunch. We were seated and a server took our drink orders. He served them to us and that was the last time we ever interacted with that server. He went behind he bar and despite the fact that many of us tried to get his attention to order
column5: making full eye contact with him
column6: he never came back to help us order food. I think he may have even been the bartender? We had to flag down a server to get every single thing else we needed: our food order
column9: literally everything. I honestly don't think we even had an actual server assigned to our table. Maybe they do tip share or something? On top of everything else
column10: the food was mediocre and way too expensive for what it was. The drinks were good but that was the absolutely only decent part about this place. We'll never go back."

author: Samantha Stratton
text: 'I threw my sister a surprise graduation brunch here and I was super satisfied with everything!!! To start Haylee the event coordinator was awesome! She accommodated 11 girls for brunch and put us in a good spot where we were kinda separate from the normal brunchers and right near a perfect photo taking spot that all my sisters friends loved! We did bottomless mimosas and they were very quick to bring over multiple pitcher fulls as soon as we would finish one
column5: which everyone loves and what makes a good bottomless brunch!! The food was also very good!!!!! The lighting and music were perfect
column6: not to much but just enough to be able to talk at the table!! Id definitely recommend coming here for brunch!! Especially if you have people coming from out of town!! And if you have a special occasion or large group reach out to Haylee!!'

author: Alva Serrano
text: 'A wonderful place'

author: Chris Jack
text: "That Presto Chicken Sandwich was absolutely epic. The staff is helpful as I've been here numerous amount of times. Drinks were a little more pricey than I remember but it could be because of COVID. Definite recommend."

author: Elias Pinto
text: 'Ordered three appetizers and loved each one. Explosions of unique flavors. The mild buffalo wings were also great.'

author: Tara InTheTardis
text: 'Great place!'

author: Hector Perez (myThumbsUpRealtorHector)
text: 'Great food. Bad service'

author: Shero
text: 'Nothing was good in this place. Don’t try.'

author: Adrienne M
text: 'Great time ! Hayley was very helpful planning our private party - We reserved the semi private room which was perfect size for a party of 17.\nOur waiters Eleni and Miquel were very attentive - the food was fabulous as well as the atmosphere. Would definitely  recommend this place for a group gathering or just a night out !'

author: Ana Duarte
text: 'Nice environment (decoration and music) but poor quality of food. Service was ok but nothing special. The calamaris were terrible. The Cobb salad was just ok; the avocado was not fresh
column5: the lettuce was just stems and the chicken breast was dry. We were afraid to order drinks since they were $16 each and they did not want it to waste the money based on the experience with the calamaris. Definitely needs improvement. It could be a great restaurant for the location and ambience.'

author: Hanna Qira
text: 'Probably the worst service I’ve ever had. Sat here for 30 minutes before we finally got our drinks. Food is good but not worth the ridiculous amount of time we had to wait for everything. Tip was included for four people so we couldn’t even adjust.'

author: Pablo Valle
text: 'Burgers are average and the local is well conditioned. They also have pizza not made by them (this was my understanding after telling that they did not have a plain margarita but instead they did have one with pepperoni). Also
column5: the waitress misunderstood the order (brought a cocktail instead of the pizza) but there was no intention to remediate it.'

author: Maryrose Ammirati
text: 'The atmosphere is better than the food. Worth a try.'

author: Fernando Robinson
text: "Very nice place but the food wasn't what I expected at all...we got beef tacos and saw a fruit fly in the guacamole
column5: we didn't make a big deal
column6: just let the waitress know and she got us fish tacos...got the check assuming we would have been extended some type of courtesy but we weren't at all...still got charged for everything and I didn't think things would play out that way...and the Mac and cheese burger had zero flavor
column7: I pretty much  chalked that one up but to still be charged for the tacos bothered me..."

author: Pao Bonilla
text: 'Don’t check the menu on the website. It is pointless since it is not updated. The food is mediocre and you’re not allow to do any modifications because “the kitchen is busy.” I wanted garlic fries instead of regular for my sandwich even if I had to pay more
column5: but my server said no. The customer service is just okay. The only positive thing I have to say about this restaurant is that the place is beautiful but if you go out to eat then that’s not the most important thing.'

author: Jennifer Rodriguez
text: 'Bad table service.'

author: alejandrina ramirez
text: 'Bad table service. Very disappointed.'

author: Jo Hayes
text: "Everything was super disorganized when we were here from service
column5: to bar
column6: to food. Food was literally just ok 🤷 We went here to get out of the rain which is the only reason I guess I'd go back"

author: Devon Tomb
text: 'Short rib grilled cheese was good
column5: classic burger was also good.'

author: Sarolta Tóth
text: "Food was awful! We ordered drinks and fried calamari. Drinks were good but food was so bad!!!!! Tasteless. Even the marina sause! Our waiter had no clue how to serve people and do a good job in his position. Plus for this experience they added the tip to our check. For 2 people??? ... I worked in restaurants so I know what I'm talking about. Never again this place."

author: Sunny Singh
text: 'Too expensive food . A veg burger $ 18 is more costly than the meat. On too that they are putting a gratituty for 2 people which is 18% . Won’t visit again.'

author: Sidra Khan
text: 'Unreasonable. They charge you extra if people don’t show up even though it’s PER PERSON. They also said they can’t substitute patties for vegetarians for other burgers. Not exclusive for vegetarians since they can’t accommodate other options. The veggie burger
column5: pizza and chicken burger were dry. They also said they can’t substitute because the kitchen is “busy” when the place was empty. Don’t recommend.'

author: adriBennitez
text: 'the food is delicious the service is excellent and it is the best place to watch the ufc fights'

highly recommended

author: Charnis Patel
text: 'Went for first time and it was my last first and last time I visited this place
column5: the food was cold and I ordered soda and lemonade but the soda taste like sweet water and lemonade taste nasty. After that we ordered 24k gold wing and it smells nasty and taste like garbage food I throw all 24k gold wings in garbage.'

author: RM
text: "Absolutely horrendous customer service! Nobody answers the phones. Restaurant manager was unhelpful
column5: rude and unprofessional! What makes it worse is that they don't care about feedback. Worst restaurant experience ever! Plenty of better restaurants nearby. Don't waste your time or money at Ainsworth...they ain't worth it."

author: Luminita F
text: 'The food here is very good - simple american dishes with a hint of latin influences. We had to wait quite a while for a table outside
column5: but it was just one of those days when the good weather brings visitors from all over the place in Hoboken. Afterwards everything went smooth.'

author: Ivan Leo
text: 'The best place to eat and drink!'

author: Brenda Walker
text: 'I’ve been here a couple times as the pricing
column5: service

column7: they’re not skimpy on the bottomless brunch as some places tend to be.'

author: TriBeCa Beverage Building a Small Business
text: 'Best burger'

text: "(Translated by Google) I couldn't see the Manhattan view because of the foggy and rainy weather ...\nWe wanted to experience golden covered chicken

column8: our ears may be too used to silence during the pandemic ...\nI wanted sangria

They were complying with covid 19 measures ...

author: Tim Prilucik
text: 'Nice views of Manhattan and the Hudson but thats about the bulk of what is good here. Highly overpriced for the portion size they offer. Cocktail (summer mule) was in a mule glass that could fit inside a typical moscow mule mug and 3/4 ice. Pathetic tbh. Asked for medium rare burger. Came well done and cost $17. Definitely not 1/2lb of meat and came with maybe 12 fries total?\nServer was inattentive to us yet had plenty of time for his boys at a nearby table that walked in. No silverware or napkins at the table. No checkup. No 2nd round of drinks. And $4 for a soft drink? Come on now. Covid sucks for everyone not just your business. Shouldve ate at one of the other nice looking spots within a 1/4 mile radius.'

author: Ravi Chandra Vemuri
text: 'Nice place to hangout with friends. Expensive place. Everything is good'

text:
'(Translated by Google) Ehh 3/5 ⭐️

Ehh 3/5 ⭐️'

text: 'Poor service. I was there for 15 mins and no one greeted me. When the buzzer finally gets there with the water I say hello and he completely ignores me. I go to the rest room and a manager asks me to put my mask on
column5: mind you some people …'

author: valentina albano loaiza
text: 'I want to start by saying the place is very pretty
column5: food delicious. Great cocktails. I had the spicy margarita. Refreshing and tasty. I also had the cocktail with coconut was delicious.  Our server was great too. .. we were 3 people. I …'

column5: and the restaurant seemed to be trying to con some teenagers out of a couple hundred dollars with some b/s line about minimum checks and drinks. The kids were clearly not of drinking age …'

author: Abhishek Malusare
text: 'Great place to go on a date late at night. It is open till 2am. Ambience is good and the food is tasty. Just 5 mins walk from the Hoboken path station. Waterfront facing and has outside and indoor sitting both. Due to winters prefer indoor sitting.'

author: Xauen Zirpolo
text: 'Food was good
column5: but menu is quite limited at dinner time as far as entrees go (more sandwiches and apps than anything). Restaurant was also WAY over indoor dining capacity'

author: Chloe Benas
text: 'Great spot. Good outdoor seating
column5: they acclimated to the pandemic well. I enjoyed sipping wine and having a burger here with friends!'

author: Dawn A

column5: we were greeted by a boy named Alex

text: 'Service is friendly and food is good as well. Nice lit place. Chandeliers add a nice look to the place.'

column8: we got served warm flat beer on tap.'

author: Abdullah Mukhtar
text: "The food was average. It's basically just a hang out spot nothing spectacular."

author: Veronica
text: 'Presentation of the place was nice. Music was super loud though.  I walked in with my partner and we stood at the front booth waiting for a hostess for about 7-8 mins
column5: and it was a slow Sunday night.. When we were seated we didn’t get a …'

author: Mandy Ogden
text: 'I had a horrible experience at Ainsworth when I went for lunch today with my two friends. We had high expectations considering there’s one in the city and it’s on the water next to other popular restaurants. It took over 2 hours for us to …'

text: '(Translated by Google) The place is very cozy and with excellent views
column5: if you are in Hoboken I recommend it to eat something or have a few drinks. …'

text: "Very bad service. Didn't bring any napkins.The burgers smells and fries was old. Over all a tourist trap."

author: Daniela Tasko
text: 'Good food ! Terrible customer service. Starting  with the hostess. I highly recommend to get a better one
column5: she was just looking at her phone when the whole restaurant is full.'

author: Cassidy Spencer
text: 'Had the most amazing brunch at the Ainsworth. Sasha took such great care of us- 10/10 would recommend. Great atmosphere and great crew- definitely will be back! Thanks Sasha!'

text: 'We loved their burgers. really really good.\nthe service was also really good. we were not happy with our drink and they changed for us for free 👍'

text: 'Amazing drinks'

author: Patrick Conlon
text: 'The menu you see online is different from the menu they have in the store. I spent all morning getting excited for one menu item. Arrived to the restaurant and they told me that item was not available. So
column5: I was disappointed. My avocado toast was good
